TEXT: The applicant , Mr PERSON , a NORP citizen , who was born in DATE , died on DATE . His wife , PERSON expressed a wish to pursue the application . ORG are represented by their Agent Ms Lidija PERSON .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .
On DATE the applicant instituted civil proceedings before ORG ( PERSON u GPE ) seeking damages from GPE .

Before CARDINAL DATE , when the LAW entered into force in respect of GPE , the first instance court adopted a judgment which was quashed upon the applicant ’s appeal . The first instance court then adopted a new judgment which was upheld upon the applicant ’s appeal by ORG ( PERSON u GPE ) on DATE .
On DATE the applicant filed a request for revision on points of law .

On DATE ORG rejected the applicant ’s request . On DATE the decision to that effect was forwarded to ORG Case - Law Study Department ( Služba evidencije , praćenja i proučavanja sudske prakse ) in order to secure its conformity with ORG case - law .
On DATE the above - mentioned ORG forwarded the decision to ORG .
On DATE the decision was forwarded to ORG and from there , on CARDINAL DATE , to ORG . The latter served the decision on the applicant on DATE .
On DATE the applicant filed a constitutional complaint .
On DATE ORG invited the applicant to file additional submissions . The applicant did so on DATE .
On DATE ORG sent the case - file to ORG .
On DATE ORG forwarded the applicant ’s complaint to ORG ( ORG odvjetništvo PERSON ) .
On DATE ORG rejected the applicant ’s complaint .
